name: InfusionSquad
0:
”Alexa, open Infusion Squad.”
”Alexa, tell Infusion Squad to play a mission.”
”Alexa, ask Infusion Squad if there are any new missions.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: infusion squad
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is designed to help inform and educate the Hemophilia community and their caregivers about their existing condition, the overall infusion process and important safety information. This information is delivered in an entertaining and conversational manner, with no medical recommendations or advice.
 
This tool does not provide medical advice, but is for informational and educational purposes only, specifically for those within the Hemophilia community that infuse or caregivers who administer the infusion. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

FIX-US-6136 V6 03/19
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
